label: ham
subject: Re: [perl #41496] [TODO] config - profiling options should have their own step in config/init/defaults.pm
body: It is easy to perceive that it is in these successive changes in the constitution of man that we must look for the origin of those differences which now distinguish men, who, it is allowed, are as equal among themselves as were the animals of every kind, before physical causes had introduced those varieties which are now observable among some of them.
